Text:
This is so great. Good MLB coverage here on TPB.

Thanks for the effort.

But wtf? 4.81 GB? How many innings did this game have? Well, don't tell me, I'll see. ^^

If you'd come across a White Sox game once in a while, maybe you could post it too. That would be great. But if you don't it's no problem, your posted games are great.

It's so big because is 720p (wrong labeled 540p). And I'll try to help you with the White Sox. I'm not a MLB fan, so I don't know anything about this game. But if you'll ask once in a while what game you'd like to see I'll help you, my friend.

Wow, allready White Sox games up.
You sure are fast. But don't stress yourself puttig too many games up. Even one game a day is an incredibly high ratio. I don't know if I can download an watch them all but those I do I'll seed for at least 2 weeks or so, probably longer. Depends on my remaining diskpace. :)
You're welcome my friend! Then 1 game/day it is. If I don't forget... :)
